attributes.action: take measures to prohibit local authorities from introducing a household waste disposal charge in addition to Council Tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the Council Tax should make full provision for all domestic waste collections and disposals. Any additional charges amount to a local stealth tax and would certainly lead to an increase in fly-tipping and street litter.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
